why-me.title: Why me
why-me.whyMeText: Why are you passionate about coding? You can include some key traits like: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and collaboration. A problem-solving mindset is always nice to have.

inputBox.subject: I am currently learning
inputBox.inputText: Show that you are motivated to continually improve your skills, implement innovative solutions and stay abreast of new technologies.

contact.headline: Let us work togehter!
contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work. Example: Feel free to get in touch with job offers or opportunities such as: ...

message.label: Your message
message.privacyText: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

contact.descriptionText: Feel free to get in touch with job offers or opportunities such as: ... Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.

feedback.titel: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
feedback.mobileTitel2: Here what my colleagues said about me

feedback1.text: ‘’Claudia had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members. She is a reliable and friendly person.‘’

feedback2.text: ‘’Claudia is a reliable and friendly person. Works in a structured way and write a clear code. I recommend her as a colleague.‘’

feedback3.text: ‘’She is a trustworthy teamplayer and can cope with the stress of deadlines. Structured work and clear code.‘’

currentLearning.inputText: that you are motivated to continually improve your skills, implement innovative solutions and stay abreast of new technologies.

EL_POLO_LOCO.TITLE: El Polo Loco
EL_POLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: Jump-and-run game inspired by classic platformers.

BULLET_POINTS.ABOUT_CONTENT: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the Chicken.
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_TITLE: How I have organised my work process
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_CONTENT: How do you keep your code clean and maintainable? Have you broken the project down into reusable modules or components? Focus on documentation, naming files, variables, classes and testing.
BULLET_POINTS.LEARNINGS_CONTENT: As someone who is always trying to learn new technologies, you may have enjoyed working on this project because it allowed you to delve deep into a particular technology. Give details, such as the name of the framework or language you mean.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System.

BULLET_POINTS.ABOUT_CONTENT: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_TITLE: How I have organised my work process
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_CONTENT: How do you keep your code clean and maintainable? Have you broken the project down into reusable modules or components? Focus on documentation, naming files, variables, classes and testing.
BULLET_POINTS.LEARNINGS_CONTENT: How many people were in the team and what was your role? Describe your tasks in 1-2 sentences. It is nice to mention a good teamwork and cooperation.

ONGOING_PROJECT.TITLE: Ongoing Project
ONGOING_PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System.

BULLET_POINTS.ABOUT_CONTENT:
What are you currently working on and what features are you implementing? What is the key to success in your projects? You can mention good planning, code quality and execution.

Show a desire to learn new technologies and continually improve your skills.

VAT.ID: VAT ID according to § 27 a German VAT Act: DE357705274
